Name of the model file: Name of the output fits file
PSF parameter p0 (PSF-like selection radius = sqrt(p0^2*(E/p1)^(-2*p2) + p3^2))
PSF parameter p1 (PSF-like selection radius = sqrt(p0^2*(E/p1)^(-2*p2) + p3^2))
PSF parameter p2 (PSF-like selection radius = sqrt(p0^2*(E/p1)^(-2*p2) + p3^2))
PSF parameter p3 (PSF-like selection radius = sqrt(p0^2*(E/p1)^(-2*p2) + p3^2))

This parameter defines the k-interval over which the Poisson probability of each spectral bin is considered when computing the log-likelihood distribution. The default value 1e-7 provides a 1% precision on PS up to PS=20. prob_epsilon=1e-11 provides a 5% precision up to 250 but that makes the script slower.
Number of bin of the PSF
nb of bins merged when rebinning the energy axis
